divs: Sighting DetailsWe were having a dinner party on the front deck when some of the guests saw this light behaving in a strange manner going n to s then up and then towards us then vanishing. It came within a mile or two of us then vanished.
Summary: light moving in mountain see by group of 8 going n to s then straight up
trends: There have been no other sightings in Holbrook
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
